requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or later (w/ SSE2)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 136 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64 bit required

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64 Bit/ Windows 8 64 Bit/ Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960 (1GB) or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This is subject to change as improvements are made
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit / Windows 8 64 bit / Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core i5/i7 3.3 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 980 Ti/980 (High settings) and 1070 (Ultra settings) or AMD equivalents
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This is subject to change as improvements are made

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Intel Mac, OS X Version Snow Leopard 10.6.3 and up
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard

Minimum:
  • OS: All
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
